Package eu.mondo.mondix.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMondixInstance
    A Mondix indexer that publishes a number of base relations (IMondixRelation).
    IMondixRelation
    Represents a base relation for which queries can be opened.
    INullaryQueryInstance
    Special case of IQueryInstance where the number of selected columns is known to be 0.
    IQueryInstance
    A query with potential parameter substitutions (seed).
    IQueryInstanceDirect<Row>
    A specialized version of IQueryInstance that offers direct access to the internal memory representation of the indexer to avoid copying result tuples into the standard format.
    IQueryInstanceDirect.RowInterpreter<Row>
    An adapter object to interpret the internal row representation of a IQueryInstanceDirect.
    IUnaryQueryInstance
    Special case of IQueryInstance where the number of selected columns is known to be 1.
